body: Just a quick question, I already have Razer game booster installed, is it worth installing razer cortex too?
body_tagged: Just a quick question, I already have Razer game booster installed, is it worth installing razer cortex too?
title: Razer Cortex

replies.body: Does Razer Game Booster even make a difference? I can't seem to find any significant changes while playing with it :p
replies.body_tagged: Does Razer Game Booster even make a difference? I can't seem to find any significant changes while playing with it :p

replies.body:
For me, it doesn't really help that much for minecraft, but in other games it helps a bit.
(For game booster only :P no idea what cortex is)
replies.body_tagged:
For me, it doesn't really help that much for minecraft, but in other games it helps a bit.
(For game booster only :P no idea what cortex is)

replies.body: For me, it really helped however I have a bad PC so I'm not sure if it affects better PCs.
replies.body_tagged: For me, it really helped however I have a bad PC so I'm not sure if it affects better PCs.
